# localizedDescription

**Instance Property**

The sticker’s localized description.

## Declaration

```swift
var localizedDescription: String { get }
```

## Reading Sticker Data

- **imageFileURL**: The file URL of the image displayed by the sticker.

items.description: The file URL of the image displayed by the sticker.
